HelpBalloon.title: Example Ajax XML Call
HelpBalloon.content:
This is an example of how to pull balloon content in via an XML ajax call. The source for this xml file is test.xml. Please note the structure of the XML file must match:

<HelpBalloon>
  <title>
    Your Balloon Title Here
  </title>
  <content>
    Your Balloon body
	content goes here. 
    It's usually wise
	to wrap this in a
	<![CDATA[ ]]> tag.
  </content>
</HelpBalloon>

This balloon also illustrates how it deals with long content
